item.title: Intro To Database Management System
item.description: Introduction To DBMS Course PPT Schema & Instance Schema - A schema is a physical or logical structure of the data-base. The basically comprise the columns along with the table. Instance - This is the actual data, when the schema is populated by real values and data entries in the form of rows. Data Model The collection of tools that describe the data. - Data : The data itself is an integral part of the data-base.
